verses.name: Joel 1:5
verses.text: Awake, ye drunkards, and weep; and howl, all ye drinkers of wine, because of the new wine; for it is cut off from your mouth.

verses.name: Joel 1:6
verses.text: For a nation is come up upon my land, strong, and without number, whose teeth are the teeth of a lion, and he hath the cheek teeth of a great lion.

verses.name: Joel 1:7
verses.text: He hath laid my vine waste, and barked my fig tree: he hath made it clean bare, and cast it away; the branches thereof are made white.

verses.name: Joel 1:8
verses.text: Lament like a virgin girded with sackcloth for the husband of her youth.
